description.en:
Komodo is an end-to-end blockchain infrastructure solutions provider. Consistently recognized as one of the world’s most innovative blockchain projects, Komodo is developing technologies at the cutting-edge of the blockchain industry. 

In reality, most blockchain platforms today are but a single blockchain that offers support for smart contracts and decentralized applications. This model forces all projects to share the same infrastructure, leading to congestion, increased transactions fees, and stifled growth. 

Whereas other blockchain platforms employ a single, shared-blockchain model, Komodo’s federated multi-chain architecture provides each and every external project with independent infrastructure and a dedicated blockchain. 

This multi-chain design is what makes Komodo unique among blockchain platforms. Each project is given the opportunity to create their own blockchain ecosystem via Komodo’s infinitely scalable infrastructure. 

Komodo’s tech enables seamless cross-chain interoperability among all federated blockchains. Every blockchain built with Komodo is also connected to 95% of chains outside the federation via atomic swap technology. Future plans are in place for blockchain bridging support, which will create cross-chain fungibility throughout the entire blockchains industry. 

Moreover, with Komodo’s architecture, multiple blockchains can sync up and function as a single chain. If one chain is not meeting performance needs, additional chains can be added to form a blockchain cluster. A blockchain cluster boosts performance linearly without inflating coin supply or devaluing the currency. 

The Komodo ecosystem is not only scalable and interoperable, it’s also secured with the power of the Bitcoin network. This is accomplished with a series of cross-chain notarizations that store a blockhash onto the Bitcoin ledger every ten minutes, providing protection from 51% attacks. 

Join Komodo as we continue to accelerate the global adoption of blockchain technology.

description.ko:
코모도는 지캐시에서 포크된 코인으로, 지캐시의 익명성에 비트코인 수준의 보안을 제공하는 가상화폐입니다. 지캐시에서 포크되었기 때문에, 영지식증명을 통해 익명성을 보장하고 선택적 투명성이 제공되는 주요 기능은 똑같이 지원됩니다. 하지만 추가로 dPoW 컨센서스를 사용하고 SuperNET 플랫폼를 기반으로 운영된다는 점이 특징적입니다. 

코인 특징
1. 코모도 코인은 dPoW(delayed proof of work) 시스템을 사용합니다. 이 합의 메커니즘은 기존의 코모도 블록체인 외에 추가로 비트코인 블록체인도 사용해 이중보안을 달성합니다. 두 개의 보안 레벨은 각기 다른 주체가 담당하는데, 코모도 네트워크의 일반 채굴자들과 생성된 블록들을 비트코인 네트워크에서 다시 검증을 받는 공증 노드(notary nodes)가 있습니다. 공증 노드는 최대 64개까지 지정될 수 있으며, 코모도 보유자들에 의해 선정됩니다. 이렇게 dPoW는 비트코인에 연결되어 운영되기 때문에 비트코인 PoW만큼 안전하고, 컴퓨팅파워의 낭비를 방지함으로써 더 효과적인 시스템을 구축합니다. 한편, dPoW를 기반으로 다른 블록체인이 코모도 블록체인을 통해 이중 보안 효과를 받을 수 있습니다. 

2. 코모도 코인은 32개의 다른 코모도 통화로 전환될 수 있습니다. 각 통화는 독립적인 블록체인을 가지고 있어 다른 가상화폐들처럼 운영되며, 실제 통화 가격에 연동되어있기 때문에 안정적인 가치를 유지한다고 합니다. 

3. 처음에 발행된 코모도는 1억 개였고, 이들 중 90%는 ICO 시장을 통해 비트코인(BTC) 투자자에게 지급되거나 비트코인다크(BTCD)와 교환되었습니다. BTCD의 80%가 이미 교환되었고, 2018년 1월까지 약 1BTCD = 50 KMD로 교환 가능합니다. 나머지 10%는 개발을 위해 보관한다고 합니다. 그리고 약 2030년 즈음에는 최대공급량인 2억 개의 코인이 발행될 것으로 예측됩니다. 이들 대다수는 보상의 개념으로 코모도 사용자들에게 매년 5%씩 지급될 것입니다.
description.ar:
Komodo is an end-to-end blockchain infrastructure solutions provider. Consistently recognized as one of the world’s most innovative blockchain projects, Komodo is developing technologies at the cutting-edge of the blockchain industry. 

In reality, most blockchain platforms today are but a single blockchain that offers support for smart contracts and decentralized applications. This model forces all projects to share the same infrastructure, leading to congestion, increased transactions fees, and stifled growth. 

Whereas other blockchain platforms employ a single, shared-blockchain model, Komodo’s federated multi-chain architecture provides each and every external project with independent infrastructure and a dedicated blockchain. 

This multi-chain design is what makes Komodo unique among blockchain platforms. Each project is given the opportunity to create their own blockchain ecosystem via Komodo’s infinitely scalable infrastructure. 

Komodo’s tech enables seamless cross-chain interoperability among all federated blockchains. Every blockchain built with Komodo is also connected to 95% of chains outside the federation via atomic swap technology. Future plans are in place for blockchain bridging support, which will create cross-chain fungibility throughout the entire blockchains industry. 

Moreover, with Komodo’s architecture, multiple blockchains can sync up and function as a single chain. If one chain is not meeting performance needs, additional chains can be added to form a blockchain cluster. A blockchain cluster boosts performance linearly without inflating coin supply or devaluing the currency. 

The Komodo ecosystem is not only scalable and interoperable, it’s also secured with the power of the Bitcoin network. This is accomplished with a series of cross-chain notarizations that store a blockhash onto the Bitcoin ledger every ten minutes, providing protection from 51% attacks. 

Join Komodo as we continue to accelerate the global adoption of blockchain technology.

In reality, most blockchain platforms today are but a single blockchain that offers support for smart contracts and decentralized applications. This model forces all projects to share the same infrastructure, leading to congestion, increased transactions fees, and stifled growth. 

Whereas other blockchain platforms employ a single, shared-blockchain model, Komodo’s federated multi-chain architecture provides each and every external project with independent infrastructure and a dedicated blockchain. 

This multi-chain design is what makes Komodo unique among blockchain platforms. Each project is given the opportunity to create their own blockchain ecosystem via Komodo’s infinitely scalable infrastructure. 

Komodo’s tech enables seamless cross-chain interoperability among all federated blockchains. Every blockchain built with Komodo is also connected to 95% of chains outside the federation via atomic swap technology. Future plans are in place for blockchain bridging support, which will create cross-chain fungibility throughout the entire blockchains industry. 

Moreover, with Komodo’s architecture, multiple blockchains can sync up and function as a single chain. If one chain is not meeting performance needs, additional chains can be added to form a blockchain cluster. A blockchain cluster boosts performance linearly without inflating coin supply or devaluing the currency. 

The Komodo ecosystem is not only scalable and interoperable, it’s also secured with the power of the Bitcoin network. This is accomplished with a series of cross-chain notarizations that store a blockhash onto the Bitcoin ledger every ten minutes, providing protection from 51% attacks. 

Join Komodo as we continue to accelerate the global adoption of blockchain technology.

ico_data.short_desc: We provide security, freedom and independence to all people through blockchain technology to create a flourishing, decentralized world.

status_updates.description:
Merhaba Türkiye! 🇹🇷

We are happy to announce that our website is now available in Turkish! - Komodo, blokzincir teknolojisi sektöründe en hızlı büyüyen ülkelerin başında yer alan Türkiye ile buluşuyor!

komodoplatform.com/tr/

Hello everyone! I hope you've all had a great weekend!

Komodo CTO Kadan Stadelmann sat down for a superb interview with Andy Pickering from Brave New Coin. He talks about his past and his background as a white-hat hacker, describes Komodo's vision, and explains why AtomicDEX is the industry leader today.

Listen to the podcast here.
https://bravenewcoin.com/insights/podcasts/atomic-dex-how-the-komodo-decentralized-exchange-enables-atomic-swaps

The Komodo team is excited to report that a stablecoin suite is now listed for trading on AtomicDEX. 

Five stablecoins— USD Coin (USDC), True USD (TUSD), Dai Stablecoin (DAI), Paxos (PAX), and Binance USD (BUSD)— are now available for peer-to-peer trading on AtomicDEX via Komodo’s industry-leading atomic swap technology.

Read more here.
https://komodoplatform.com/stablecoin-suite-atomicdex/

Learn more about the engine that powers the AtomicDEX protocol.

This blog post will explain in great detail Market Maker 2, the underlying protocol that powers secure, peer-to-peer atomic swaps on AtomicDEX.

komodoplatform.com/market-maker-2-overview/

Komodo's Lead Developer James 'jl777' Lee recently developed a solution to the Difficulty Strand Attack called Adaptive Proof of Work (APoW). 

Learn more here.

https://komodoplatform.com/adaptive-proof-of-work/

We are very excited to announce the public beta phase of AtomicDEX, the industry's only mobile-native decentralized exchange built on anything-to-anything, asset-agnostic atomic swaps. This represents a generational change in atomic swap technology. 

Sign up at https://atomicdex.io, be one of the first to test AtomicDEX, and join us as we continue to revolutionize the blockchain space.

Atomic swaps were, for many years, the Holy Grail of our industry. We've just published a comprehensive history of atomic swap technology for researchers and analysts.

Read more:
komodoplatform.com/komodo-and-the-early-pioneers-of-atomic-swaps
